sources.title: Method | Full Intense Thriller Movie | Elizabeth Hurley
sources.description:
Method - The line between fantasy and reality blurs when an actress begins behaving like the 19th-century murderer she is playing.
2004.  Stars: Elizabeth Hurley, Jeremy Sisto, Oliver Tobias

metadata.Plot: Actor Jae-Ha (Park Sung-Woong) is cast for the two-man stage play "Unchain." Also cast for "Unchain" is idol star Young-Woo (Oh Seung-Hoon). Young-Woo is not enthused about appearing in the stage play. At first, the two men do not get along. As they get more immersed in the characters they play and the gay-themed story, the two men develop unexpected feelings. Meanwhile, Hee-Won (Yoon Seung-Ah) is a Jae-Ha's girlfriend. She has a strange feeling about the relationship between Jae-Ha and Young-Woo.
metadata.Actors: Park Sung-woong, Yoon Seung-ah, Ryu Tae-ho
